text: "Un-Break My Heart" is a 1996 song by American singer Toni Braxton and taken from her second studio album Secrets and won a Grammy in 1997. It topped the single charts for 11 weeks in the United States. It has been covered by Weezer and Il Divo. The song has a tempo of 55 bpm, and was written in D minor. == References == Category:1996 songs Category:1990s ballads Category:Billboard Hot 100 number one songs Category:Pop ballads Category:R&B; ballads Category:Toni Braxton songs Category:Weezer songs
title: Un-Break My Heart
